NAME: Birmingham City Football Club - Helping out coaching young kids that are part of the Birmingham City training camp.
DESCRIPTION: This is a great opportunity for football fans. You will be stewarding around the stadium, including pitchside, and will be able to watch the game after kick off. During the post match clean up you will have the opportunity to see a little behind the scenes action, and perhaps meet some of the players. You will also be required at some training sessions and will be able to gain experience of professional level coaching in football.

NAME: Birmingham City Football Club - Stewarding, and post match cleanups, you will be able to watch the big game.
DESCRIPTION: This is a great opportunity for football fans. You will be stewarding around the stadium, including pitchside, and will be able to watch the game after kick off. NAME: Duel in the Pool Event - Come and join some of the top swimmers in the country.
DESCRIPTION: This will be a great all day event where some of the best swimmers in the country will be competing in a charity gala in the centre of Birmingham. You will be greeting some of the VIPs and escorting them to their special viewing box and then you'll get the chance to help out with the stars of the show.
